verbs.description: [ARG0: some veterans] [V: say] [ARG1: trump is politicizing the military by sending troops to the border days before midterm election a growing number of retired military officers are calling president trump decision to order troops to the southwest border days before the midterm election a damaging stunt that compromises the military position as an institution that should be shielded from electoral politics united states army gen martin dempsey trump los angeles times central america james mattis election department of homeland security james n mattis military united states department of homeland security army gen martin dempsey lapan pentagon chairman]
